chatPlus.title: ChatPlus
chatPlus.chatSettings.tooltip: Change chat settings similar to vanilla Minecraft.
chatPlus.chatSettings.chatTextSize.toolt: Changes the chat text size. This does not effect width/height.
chatPlus.chatSettings.maxMessages.toolti: The maximum number of messages to store. Minecraft's default is 100. Increasing this will increase memory usage.
chatPlus.chatSettings.textOpacity.toolti: Changes the opacity of the chat text.
Changes the opacity of the chat background.
chatPlus.chatSettings.lineSpacing.toolti: Changes the spacing between lines of text in chat.
Changes the way timestamps are displayed in over messages in chat.
chatPlus.chatKeyBinds.tooltip: Hold down bound keys while chat is focused to perform actions.
chatPlus.chatTabs.up.tooltip: Move this tab to the left. The first tab will always be the selected tab on start.
chatPlus.chatTabs.down.tooltip: Move this tab to the right. The first tab will always be the selected tab on start.
chatPlus.chatTabs.name: Name
chatPlus.chatTabs.delete.tooltip: UNDOABLE! Delete this tab. You cannot delete the currently selected tab.
